doc.title: Around Claudia Schiffer
doc.plot: One-hour made-for-television documentary/special about fashion model Claudia Schiffer featuring a comical self-interview. The questions are asked by a "journalist Claudia" with the 'real' Claudia answering. More serious interviews with Claudia and high fashion personalities are also interspersed through-out the special. The crew also followed Claudia all over Europe and the United States during the professional and personal moments to obtain never-before-seen footage.
